name: Dreamer (itch) (ipingui)
description:
My LD48 entry.

Nightmare above. Dream Deeper.

Fall deeper into your dream to get a higher score! Defeat the dream sheep to increase your multiplier! Submit your high score to the leaderboards! The faster you fall, the quicker your score increases, but the harder it gets to control.

Controls

  • A/D = Left/Right
  • S = Speed Boost
  • W = Slow Down
  • S, quickly followed by W = Quick boost upwards
